resources.string: Check to display an animation behind the start menu.
Uncheck to not display an animation behind the start menu.
Uncheck to no longer display the path the UFO has traveled.
Check to display the path the UFO has traveled.
Nice, you made it to the end. See how fast you can do it next time.
Good job, you completed the maze in %1$d minutes and %2$d.%3$d seconds.
Good job, you completed the maze in 1 minute and %1$d.%2$d seconds.
Congratulations, you completed the maze in %1$d.%2$d seconds!
